mapper.select:
select role_id, role_name, role_type from t_auth_role where 1=1 and `status`=true
and role_name=#{roleName}
select role_id, role_name, role_type, remark from t_auth_role where 1=1 and `status`=true and role_id=#{roleId}

select role_id, role_name, role_type, remark, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time from t_auth_role where 1=1 and `status`=true
and role_name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
and role_type = #{roleType}
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
ORDER BY update_time desc
